columns.name: aircraftPossibilityCode
columns.description: Type of aircraft to be used if any specific requirements (e.g. Pure freighter; etc.)

columns.name: includedViaPoints
columns.description: Locations or stations to included in the routing

columns.name: maxSegments
columns.description: Maximum number of segments for the transportation of the goods. 1 means direct flight

columns.name: preferredTransportId
columns.description: When part of the Request it refers to the preferred Transport ID from the customer. When part of the BookingOption (offer or actual booking) it refers to the expected Transport ID or flight

columns.name: priceReferenceId
columns.description: Reference to a price reference if existing (e.g. Allotment number; contract reference; etc.)
